message:
Hi geeks :D
I'm trying to make a Hijri Calendar in Windows Phone 
I found a class Called HijriCalendar but I don't know how to use it
I tried searching for samples but I failed :(
I'm also trying to make this calendar same as the Native one
Any help ?

data.message:
I wrote this blog post about getting Hijri data in Windows 8.1 before. windows Phone and windows 8 are very similar so I guess it may be useful 

http://ahmedkamal.github.io/2014/04/how-to-get-the-hijri-date-in-windows-8-1-accurately.html
You can get the day, month, year and day of week using the methods that get these in the class, then get the days of the month using month and year you have, and create your UI based on that.

Ahmed Kamal Thank you very much :)
Mohamed Meligy
Any recommendations or advices of how to create it ?

You just new it. Look at this example: http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.globalization.hijricalendar.getmonth(v=vs.110).aspx
Replace myDT with something like DateTime.Now (if there's such in WP8) and continue with the rest of the xample

I assume if you click on any of the methods in http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/library/system.globalization.hijricalendar(v=vs.110).aspx and go down to the example you'll see how to create it, which is just `new HijriCalendar()`

No, you misunderstood me
I'm talking about the calendar's UI
You'll probably need to create it from scratch yourself using some sort of grid control or so - In short: I don't know :D

Amazing :D

Abdullah El-menawy Do you know XAML well ? If so , it would be easy for you to create / customize an existing code to fit your needs. You will use grid , some stackpanels , buttons and some data binding :)

Also if you aren't looking for a very specific features , you can use some f the available controls 

Check this project :
http://wpcontrols.codeplex.com/

Telerik also provides a calendar control that you can use if you have access to Telerik Controls

http://www.telerik.com/products/windows-phone/overview/all-controls/calendar.aspx

Also

http://maheshprasad.blogspot.in/2010/12/calendar-control-for-windows-phone-7.html
